content.value: Chanagun Rattana-udom (Thai: ‡∏ä‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ï‡πå ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏ô‡∏≠‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏°), nicknamed Atom (Thai: ‡∏≠‡∏∞‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏°) (born 15 December 1991) is a Thai-Iranian singer and songwriter. He is signed into White Music Thailand.
His notable songs are "Please", "‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ (Karma)", "‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ù‡∏∏‡πà‡∏ô (Dust)" and "Good Morning Teacher". They have since, became very popular pop songs in the country.

deungdutjaisNote: Atom really never disappoints, does he? I still remember when his debut single came out, and I really liked it and mentioned hoping he‚Äôd make it big and stick around for a while. And looks like he has! Loving the jazzy swank to this song, as well as the cultural theme of merit running out and racking up too much karma, thus needing to watch what one does. I think the music video was perfect for this song, and I like how the girl runs into a string of bad luck as all the guys she‚Äôs ever wronged come back to haunt her, and she wakes up realizing she‚Äôs been given a second chance to make up for her karma~ Perfect storytelling without any dialogue üôÇ
